# tokenizingCharacterSet

**Instance Property**

The receiver’s tokenizing character set to a given character set.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var tokenizingCharacterSet: CharacterSet! { get set }
```

## Managing the Tokenizing Character Set

- **defaultTokenizingCharacterSet**: Returns the default tokenizing character set.
